name: Mitigation Playbook for Document Exploitation Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an employee opened a malicious document that led to remote code execution and data exfiltration.

if-condition--5c26f6e0-fd4e-4ebc-a35d-92.name: Check if malicious process is running

action--b1234567-c89d-12d3-a456-42661417.name: Kill malicious process
action--b1234567-c89d-12d3-a456-42661417.description: Terminate the malicious process that is executing on the host.

action--c1234567-d89c-12d3-a456-42661417.name: Isolate affected host from network
action--c1234567-d89c-12d3-a456-42661417.description: Block network access for the host that accessed the malicious file.

loop--73f1fc2b-7833-4a89-8b99-93fe2ce067.name: Scan for similar vulnerabilities across the network
loop--73f1fc2b-7833-4a89-8b99-93fe2ce067.description: Iterate through subnet to scan for vulnerabilities until all hosts are scanned.

action--d1234567-e89c-12d3-a456-42661417.name: Scan the network for similar vulnerabilities
action--d1234567-e89c-12d3-a456-42661417.description: Use nmap to scan for open ports that may indicate vulnerabilities across the subnet.
